common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Retrieve products with suggestions to improve performance

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have access to AMS features.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The seller commission operation is frozen.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. 

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"KdAksxB"},{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

","name":"page_size","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"casRTQd"},{"description":"

Recommended types. Applicable values: 

product_opportunities

optimize_increase_commission_rate

optimize_extend_promotion_period

","name":"rcmd_reason_filter","sample":"product_opportunities","type":"string","required":"True","key":"NnjipJG"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"error_business","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"hQMksJB"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zFsBXRQ"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"trafQHr"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"hYPYHw","children":[{"description":"","name":"item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"FBCXTyc","children":[{"description":"

Item ID

","name":"item_id","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"HAsMWpQ"},{"description":"

Item Name

","name":"item_name","sample":"test","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zcyHEnc"},{"description":"

Recommend reason. Applicable values: 

severe_shortage

high_popularity
optimize_commission_rate

extend_time_period

","name":"rcmd_reason","sample":"[\"severe_shortage\",\"high_popularity\"]","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"WTaEjb"},{"description":"

Campaign ID

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"iirXiBW"},{"description":"

Commission Rate, 1.11 means 1.11%, support two decimal places

","name":"commission_rate","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"pjBKQGN"},{"description":"

Period Start Time

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"kDewXFN"},{"description":"

Period End Time, if get 32503651199 (2999-12-31 23:59:59), it means no limit

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"aBfKKnC"},{"description":"

The total number of affiliates who have ever shared the product in the last 90 days

","name":"affiliate_count","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"hjcRTnk"},{"description":"

If the requested rcmd_reason_filter is product_opportunition, it is represented as item sales. Other scenarios are the total number of item sold for each product of the shop through AMS in the last 90 days

","name":"item_sold","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"SSGxtXH"},{"description":"

Campaign Status:

Upcoming

Ongoing

Terminating

","name":"campaign_status","sample":"Ongoing","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ZDanTCQ"},{"description":"

The total number of AMS orders for the product's L2 category in the last 30 days, only available when requested rcmd_reason_filter is product_opportunition

","name":"l2_category_order_count","sample":"123","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"fXMEia"},{"description":"

Minimum suggested commission rate, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places

","name":"suggest_min_rate","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"tFYbTyC"},{"description":"

Maximum suggested commission rate, 1.2 means 1.2%, support two decimal places

","name":"suggest_max_rate","sample":"1.2","type":"float","required":null,"key":"PEdQDtE"},{"description":"

Prefill rate, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places

","name":"prefill_rate","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"TBbhHkE"},{"description":"

Prefill subsidy rate, platform commission rate calculated based on seller commission, 1.2 means 1.2%, support two decimal places

","name":"prefill_subsidy_rate","sample":"1.2","type":"float","required":null,"key":"QydjwSF"},{"description":"

Display price

","name":"display_price","sample":"1.23","type":"string","required":null,"key":"kpkQxhW"},{"description":"

Has subsidy rate

","name":"has_subsidy_data","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"YStxRbD"}]},{"description":"

Total number of items that match the condition

","name":"total","sample":"1000","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"CxAAmNY"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the item list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve orders.

","name":"has_more","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"HhRABXQ"}]}]}
